title: Apple Bowls
alt: Two apple-shaped stoneware bowls with a drippy red-green glaze

title: Apple Bowls Exterior
alt: Bottoms of two apple-shaped stoneware bowls with a drippy red-green glaze. One has initials "r.s." in the foot well, while the other sports a carved cursive "redding" as its makers' mark.

title: Pinch handle mug
alt: A small stoneware mug with a red-green glaze and a pinched square hand-built handle.

title: Large drippy mug
alt: A medium-sized stoneware mug with a drippy red-black glaze and a rustic appearance.

title: Small drippy mug
alt: A small stoneware mug with a drippy red-black glaze and a rustic appearance. Some small drips of glaze run to the bottom of the foot.

title: Teacup
alt: A large green stoneware teacup with a playful handle and a white interior.

title: Copper-colored mug
alt: A copper-colored stoneware mug.

title: Mugs
alt: A collection of stoneware mugs.

title: Apple Bowl
alt: The inside of an apple-shaped bowl with a white glaze and reddish-purple drips.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Dark Green Mug
alt: The bottom of a large dark green mug with initials r.s.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Green Plate
alt: A medium-sized green plate with brown specks and a subtle spiral in the middle.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Green Plate 2
alt: A medium-sized green plate with brown specks and a subtle spiral in the middle.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Bowl
alt: A large shallow bowl with an angled foot. The outside is glazed red-green and the inside is glazed a marbled purple-red.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Pinched Jar
alt: A small pinch-built lidded jar, glazed reddish brown with a white handle on the lid.
description: Pinch-built stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Lilydale Leaf
alt: A small red-green oak leaf shaped dish.
description: Pinch-built stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Soap Dish
alt: A green-black pinched soap dish with a sloped section that drains into the sink.
description: Pinch-built stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Red Mug
alt: A metallic red mug with a black inner glaze.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Red Mug 2
alt: A metallic red mug with a black inner glaze.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Red Mug Bottom
alt: On the base of this metallic red mug is a radial pattern originating at the join-point of the handle. Also at this join-point is a small maker's mark reading r s.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Set of Red Mugs
alt: Five metallic red mugs. On one the bottom is visible and has a radial pattern on the base. On another the inside is visible and a subtle spiral is visible through a black glaze.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.

title: Pottery and Purpose
alt: A collection of mugs, one bowl, and one plate.
description: Wheel-thrown stoneware, fired to cone 10 reduction.
